```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```


``` {r packages}
require("igraph")
```

``` {r data}
NetworkEdges <- read.csv("edgelist2.csv",header=TRUE)
NetworkEdges <- as.matrix(NetworkEdges)

NodeAttributes <- read.csv("nodeattributes2.csv")
names(NodeAttributes) <- c('Id','Title')

videos <- data.frame(id=NodeAttributes$Id, title=NodeAttributes$Title)

links <- data.frame(from=NetworkEdges[,1], to=NetworkEdges[,2])

TheNetwork <- graph_from_data_frame(links, directed=TRUE, vertices=videos)

plot(TheNetwork, vertex.label.cex=0.2, vertex.size = 4, edge.arrow.size=0.1)
```


```{r clique}
largest_cliques(TheNetwork)
```

``` {r density}
igraph::edge_density(TheNetwork)
```

``` {r degreeDistribution}
barplot(degree.distribution(TheNetwork),ylab='Proportion of Nodes',xlab='Degree (0 through 18)')
```


``` {r components}
sum(component_distribution(TheNetwork))
```
